text: The Cambridge Companions series of Cambridge University Press "are a series of authoritative guides" written by academic scholars on topics and periods related to Literature and Classics, Music, and Philosophy, Religion and Culture. ==Volumes== *List of Cambridge Companions to Literature and Classics *List of Cambridge Companions to Music *List of Cambridge Companions to Philosophy, Religion and Culture ==External links== * All subjects * Browse subjects * Cambridge Companions Category:Cambridge University Press books Category:Series of books
title: Cambridge Companions
